publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3164 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIs-That the Parliament agrees that the following instruments be approved- the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2002; the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order 2002; and the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.4) (Scotland) Order 2002 (SSI 2002/231). Supported by: Euan Robson*
